Summary.Paragraph: Hi, I'm Nicholas Wegfahrt a recnet graduate from Drexel University with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science.

Bullets.Title: Developed components and pages for an affective analysis application using ReactJS
Bullets.Details: Constructed cmponents necessary for our Notifications, Settings. Additionaly, built a custom donut chart component for use accross the application.

Bullets.Title: Implemented a notification system using ReactiveX Observables and React-Toastify
Bullets.Details: Used observables to in order to trigger toast notifications upon recieving a new notification from our ASH API
